name: Bintang
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: Here is a wish for your birthday. May you receive whatever you ask for, may you find whatever you seek. Happy Bornday pren! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, If you know me keep secret yaa
replayText: Click, if you want to watch it again.
